meanings.sent1: The tailless cat was very agile.
meanings.sent2: The tailless lizard scurried across the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The tailless squirrel tried to balance on a thin branch.
meanings.sent4: The tailless kite soared gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The tailless dog wagged its stump happily.

meanings.sent1: The tailless bird hopped from branch to branch.
meanings.sent2: The tailless fish swam swiftly in the water.
meanings.sent3: The tailless bunny hopped in circles around the garden.
meanings.sent4: The tailless airplane flew smoothly through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The tailless snake slithered silently through the grass.

meanings.sent1: The tailless monkey swung effortlessly from tree to tree.
meanings.sent2: The tailless horse galloped freely in the field.
meanings.sent3: The tailless kangaroo hopped awkwardly on its hind legs.
meanings.sent4: The tailless car sped down the road with a roar.
meanings.sent5: The tailless caterpillar crawled slowly along the leaf.
